```{=html}
<style>
:root{
  --navy:#1f345c; --teal:#0b5a56; --sand:#8b6a3a;
  --green:#1fa26e; --red:#d94a4a; --purple:#6c5bd6;
  --bg: rgba(0,0,0,.04);
}

.rticker{ --speed: 35s; --gap:.8rem; position:relative; overflow:hidden; width:100%; background:var(--bg); border-radius:14px; padding:.25rem 0; }
.rticker-track{ display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:var(--gap); animation:rslide var(--speed) linear infinite; will-change:transform; }
.ritem{ display:inline-flex; }
.rbadge{
  display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:.5rem;
  font: 600 0.92rem/1.1 system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,sans-serif;
  white-space:nowrap; padding:.3rem .6rem; border-radius:999px; color:#fff;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12);
}

/* colour badges */
.rb-grad{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, var(--teal), var(--navy)); background-size:200% 100%; animation:hue 6s ease-in-out infinite; }
.rb-red{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #ff7a7a, var(--red)); }
.rb-teal{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #4fb8a8, var(--teal)); }
.rb-green{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #5dd39e, var(--green)); }
.rb-navy{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #5a6fa0, var(--navy)); }
.rb-sand{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #c6a675, var(--sand)); }
.rb-purple{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #9a8cff, var(--purple)); }
.rb-charts{ background:linear-gradient(90deg, #4fb8a8, var(--teal), var(--navy)); background-size:300% 100%; animation:hue 8s ease-in-out infinite; }

/* donut 100% + glow */
.rdonut{ stroke-dasharray:94; stroke-dashoffset:94; transform:rotate(-90deg); transform-origin:50% 50%;
         animation:donutfill 1.6s ease-out forwards, glow 2.2s ease-in-out infinite 1.6s; }

/* blinking status lights */
.rblink{ width:8px; height:8px; border-radius:50%; box-shadow:0 0 6px rgba(255,255,255,.9); }
.rblink--green{ background:#00e07b; animation:blink .9s steps(2, jump-none) infinite; }
.rblink--red{ background:#ff3b3b; animation:blink .9s steps(2, jump-none) infinite; }

/* cloud bob + pulse */
.rcloud{ animation:bob 2.4s ease-in-out infinite; }
.rpulse{ width:8px; height:8px; border-radius:50%; background:#fff; margin-left:.3rem; filter:drop-shadow(0 0 3px rgba(255,255,255,.9)); animation:pulse 1.4s ease-out infinite; }

/* counters */
#userCount{ display:inline-block; min-width:3ch; animation:countshine 2.2s linear infinite; }
#todayDate{ animation:softshine 2.6s linear infinite; }

/* chart reel */
.rcharts{ display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:.6rem; }

/* bars */
.c-bars rect{ fill:#fff; transform-origin:bottom center; animation:barPulse 1.8s ease-in-out infinite; }
.c-bars rect:nth-child(2){ animation-delay:.1s } .c-bars rect:nth-child(3){ animation-delay:.2s }
.c-bars rect:nth-child(4){ animation-delay:.3s } .c-bars rect:nth-child(5){ animation-delay:.4s }
@keyframes barPulse{ 0%,100%{ transform:scaleY(.6) } 50%{ transform:scaleY(1) } }

/* line */
.c-line polyline{ stroke:#fff; stroke-dasharray:220; stroke-dashoffset:220;
  animation:lineDraw 1.2s ease-out forwards, lineWave 3s ease-in-out infinite 1.2s; }
@keyframes lineDraw{ to{ stroke-dashoffset:0 } }
@keyframes lineWave{ 0%,100%{ transform:translateY(0) } 50%{ transform:translateY(-1px) } }

/* pie */
.c-pie .arc{ stroke:#fff; stroke-dasharray:94; stroke-dashoffset:70; transform:rotate(-90deg); transform-origin:50% 50%; animation:pieSweep 4s ease-in-out infinite; }
@keyframes pieSweep{ 0%{stroke-dashoffset:70} 30%{stroke-dashoffset:14} 60%{stroke-dashoffset:56} 100%{stroke-dashoffset:0} }

/* area */
.c-area .outline{ stroke:#fff; opacity:.95; }
.c-area .fill{ fill:#fff; opacity:.18; animation:areaShimmer 2.6s ease-in-out infinite; }
@keyframes areaShimmer{ 0%,100%{ transform:translateY(0); opacity:.18 } 50%{ transform:translateY(-1px); opacity:.28 } }

/* gauge */
.c-gauge .level{ fill:#fff; transform-origin:bottom center; animation:gaugeRise 3s ease-in-out infinite; }
@keyframes gaugeRise{ 0%{y:32; height:0} 40%{y:14; height:18} 70%{y:6; height:26} 100%{y:10; height:22} }

/* marquee slide */
@keyframes rslide{ from{transform:translateX(0)} to{transform:translateX(-50%)} }

/* fx */
@keyframes hue{ 0%{background-position:0 0} 50%{background-position:100% 0} 100%{background-position:0 0} }
@keyframes donutfill{ to{ stroke-dashoffset:0 } }
@keyframes glow{ 0%,100%{ filter:drop-shadow(0 0 0 rgba(255,255,255,0)) } 50%{ filter:drop-shadow(0 0 6px rgba(255,255,255,.8)) } }
@keyframes bob{ 0%,100%{ transform:translateY(0) } 50%{ transform:translateY(-1px) } }
@keyframes countshine{ 0%{text-shadow:none} 50%{text-shadow:0 0 6px rgba(255,255,255,.6)} 100%{text-shadow:none} }
@keyframes softshine{ 0%{text-shadow:none} 50%{text-shadow:0 0 5px rgba(255,255,255,.5)} 100%{text-shadow:none} }
@keyframes blink{ 0%{opacity:1} 50%{opacity:.15} 100%{opacity:1} }

/* small screens */
@media (max-width:420px){
  .rcharts svg[width="120"]{ width:92px; }
}

/* accessibility */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce){
  .rticker-track,.rdonut,.rcloud,.rpulse,#userCount,#todayDate,.rblink,.c-bars rect,.c-line polyline,.c-pie .arc,.c-area .fill,.c-gauge .level{ animation:none !important; }
}
</style>

<script>
/* IST-aware helpers + continuous live-ish counters (no heavy libs) */
(function(){
  // total users: count-up to 2500
  const totalTarget = 2500;
  const totalEl = document.getElementById('userCount');
  let v = 0, step = Math.ceil(totalTarget/45);
  const anim = () => { v += step; if(v >= totalTarget) v = totalTarget; totalEl.textContent = v.toLocaleString('en-IN'); if(v < totalTarget) requestAnimationFrame(anim); };
  requestAnimationFrame(anim);

  // date: Asia/Kolkata
  const dateEl = document.getElementById('todayDate');
  try{
    const d = new Date();
    const opts = { year:'numeric', month:'long', day:'numeric', timeZone:'Asia/Kolkata' };
    const txt = d.toLocaleDateString('en-IN', opts);
    dateEl.textContent = txt;
    document.querySelectorAll('.mirrorDate').forEach(n => n.textContent = txt);
  }catch(e){
    dateEl.textContent = 'today';
  }

  // users streaming now: continuous random 60‚Äì120
  const streamEl = document.getElementById('streamNow');
  const mirrors = document.querySelectorAll('.mirrorStream');
  const MIN = 60, MAX = 120;
  function rnd(){ return Math.floor(Math.random() * (MAX - MIN + 1)) + MIN; }
  function updateStream(){
    const val = rnd();
    if(streamEl){ streamEl.textContent = val; }
    mirrors.forEach(n => n.textContent = val);
  }
  updateStream();
  setInterval(updateStream, 4000); // change frequency here (ms)
})();
</script>
```

# Welcome to RAISINS {.unnumbered}

RAISINS(**R** and **AI** **S**olutions for **IN**ferential **S**tatistics) is an advanced, user-friendly online platform for statistical analysis, seamlessly integrating the power of R, Python, and Artificial Intelligence. Specially designed for agricultural research, RAISINS enables students, researchers, and professionals to perform complex analyses and generate publication-ready results without the need for software installation or coding expertise. Simply choose your analysis module, upload your dataset, and receive instant, insightful outputs. **Before RAISINS, researchers spent at least four days completing their data analysis..now, you can do it in just four seconds!**

```{=html}
.strip-wrapper{

  gap:.6rem;
}

/* button base */
.strip-wrapper .btn{
  white-space:nowrap;

  line-height:1.2;
  transition:transform .22s ease, box-shadow .22s ease, background-color .22s ease, color .22s ease, border-color .22s ease;
  box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.06);
  flex:0 1 auto;
  min-width:130px;
  padding:.55rem .8rem;
}

/* hover + active */
.strip-wrapper .btn:hover{
  transform:translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow:0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.12);
}
.strip-wrapper .btn:active{
  transform:translateY(0);
  box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.10);
}

/* hover contrast colors */
.btn-outline-dark:hover{ background:var(--r-navy); color:#047018; }
.btn-outline-success:hover{ background:var(--r-blue); color:#047018; }
.btn-outline-info:hover{ background:var(--r-info); color:#047018; }
.btn-outline-warning:hover{ background:var(--r-warn); color:#000; }
.btn-outline-secondary:hover{ background:var(--r-muted); color:#047018; }
.btn-outline-primary:hover{ background:var(--r-brown); color:#047018; }
.btn-outline-danger:hover{ background:var(--r-danger); color:#047018; }

/* focus visible */
.strip-wrapper .btn:focus-visible{
  outline:3px solid rgba(59,119,188,.45);
  outline-offset:2px;
}

/* START button base */
.start-btn{
  background:linear-gradient(135deg, var(--r-blue), var(--r-navy));
  color:#fff;
  border:none;
  font-weight:800;
  letter-spacing:.2px;
  box-shadow:0 0 8px rgba(59,119,188,.35), 0 6px 18px rgba(31,52,92,.22);
  transition:all 0.3s ease;
}
.start-btn:hover{
  background:linear-gradient(135deg, #ffcc33, #ffb703);
  color:#000;
  transform:translateY(-2px);
}

/* Rocket animation */
.start-btn .bi-rocket-takeoff{
  display:inline-block;
  margin-right:.35rem;
  transform-origin: 50% 60%;
  animation: rocketFloat 2.4s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.start-btn:hover .bi-rocket-takeoff{
  animation: rocketLaunch 0.9s ease-in-out forwards, rocketFlame 0.12s ease-in-out infinite;
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 6px rgba(255,215,0,.6));
}

@keyframes rocketFloat{
  0%   { transform: translateY(0) rotate(-6deg); }
  50%  { transform: translateY(-3px) rotate(-2deg); }
  100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(-6deg); }
}

@keyframes rocketLaunch{
  0%   { transform: translateY(0) rotate(-8deg) scale(1); }
  60%  { transform: translateY(-8px) rotate(-3deg) scale(1.03); }
  100% { transform: translateY(-12px) rotate(0deg) scale(1.05); }
}
```

```{=html}
<script>
/* confetti burst when opened */
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const details = document.getElementById("raisinsOffer");
  const canvas = document.getElementById("confettiCanvas");
  const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");

  function resizeCanvas(){
    canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
    canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
  }
  resizeCanvas();
  window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);

  function confettiBurst(){
    canvas.style.display = "block";
    const particles = Array.from({length:120}, () => ({
      x: Math.random()*canvas.width,
      y: Math.random()*-20,
      r: 4 + Math.random()*4,
      c: `hsl(${Math.random()*360},100%,60%)`,
      v: 2 + Math.random()*3
    }));
    let frame = 0;
    const interval = setInterval(()=>{
      ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);
      particles.forEach(p=>{
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(p.x,p.y,p.r,0,2*Math.PI);
        ctx.fillStyle=p.c;
        ctx.fill();
        p.y+=p.v;
      });
      frame++;
      if(frame>100){ clearInterval(interval); ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height); canvas.style.display="none"; }
    },30);
  }

  details.addEventListener("toggle", ()=>{
    if(details.open){ confettiBurst(); }
  });
});
</script>
```

```{=html}
<style>
#inline-counter {

  justify-content: center;
  gap: 60px;
  align-items: center;

  margin: 40px auto;

  align-items: center;
  gap: 14px;
  background: #fff;
  padding: 16px 28px;
  border-radius: 12px;

  text-align: left;

  font-size: 30px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2c3e50;

  font-size: 15px;
  color: #555;
  margin-top: 4px;
}

<div id="inline-counter">
  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-users"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="2500">0</div>
      <div class="label">Users</div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-university"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="6">0</div>
      <div class="label">Institutions</div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="counter-box" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="200">
    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-clock"></i></div>
    <div class="text-group">
      <div class="number" data-target="20000">0</div>
      <div class="label">User Hours</div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.4/dist/aos.js"></script>
<script>
AOS.init({ once: true });

const counters = document.querySelectorAll('#inline-counter .number');

const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
  entries.forEach(entry => {
    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
      const counter = entry.target;
      const target = +counter.getAttribute('data-target');
      let count = 0;
      const speed = 5;

      const roll = () => {
        if (count < target) {
          count += Math.ceil(target / 50);
          if (count > target) count = target;
          counter.textContent = count;
          setTimeout(roll, speed);
        } else {
          counter.textContent = target.toLocaleString() + '+';
          observer.unobserve(counter);
        }
      };
      roll();
    }
  });
}, { threshold: 0.7 });

counters.forEach(counter => observer.observe(counter));
</script>
```

```{=html}
<div class="modal" id="htmlModal" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">
  <div class="modal-dialog modal-xl modal-dialog-centered">
    <div class="modal-content border-0 shadow-lg">
      <div class="modal-header bg-light">
        <h5 class="modal-title">
          <i class="fas fa-crown text-warning me-2"></i> Subscription Plan
        </h5>
        <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal"></button>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body p-0" style="height:80vh;">
        <iframe id="htmlFrame" style="width:100%;height:100%;border:none;"></iframe>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<style>
/* Completely disable Bootstrap backdrop and fade */
.modal-backdrop {
  display: none !important;
  opacity: 0 !important;
}

/* Allow page interaction while modal is open */
body.modal-open {
  overflow: visible !important;
  pointer-events: auto !important;
  padding-right: 0 !important;
}

/* Make modal appear above all elements */
.modal {
  z-index: 5000 !important;
  pointer-events: auto !important;
}

/* Subtle slide animation */
.modal-dialog {
  transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out;
  transform: translateY(-10px);
}
.modal.show .modal-dialog {
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Keep giftbox and chat bubble below modal */
.giftbox-offer, #chatBubble {
  z-index: 1000 !important;
}
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const modalEl = document.getElementById('htmlModal');
  const iframe = document.getElementById('htmlFrame');
  let modal;

  // Initialize Bootstrap Modal without backdrop
  modal = new bootstrap.Modal(modalEl, {
    backdrop: false,
    keyboard: true,
    focus: true
  });

  // Handle button clicks
  document.querySelectorAll('[data-bs-target="#htmlModal"]').forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const src = btn.getAttribute('data-src');
      const title = btn.getAttribute('data-title') || 'Details';
      modalEl.querySelector('.modal-title').innerHTML =
        '<i class="fas fa-crown text-warning me-2"></i>' + title;
      iframe.src = src;
      modal.show();
    });
  });

  // Close modal on outside click
  modalEl.addEventListener('click', e => {
    if (e.target === modalEl) modal.hide();
  });

  // Clear iframe on close
  modalEl.addEventListener('hidden.bs.modal', () => {
    iframe.src = '';
  });
});
</script>
```
